title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19ยง 80.13 - Procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19ยง 80.13 - Procedure

State Regulations

In determining whether the request shall be filled, in
addition to any other requirement in this Part, the department may take into
consideration the following factors: (a) the purpose to which the information
shall be put; (b) whether any
privacy interests may be violated by filling the request; (c) whether the uses to which the information
may be put can be limited in order to address the concerns in subdivisions (a)
and (b) of this section; (d) whether the department is prohibited by law from releasing such information; and
(e) any other factors the
department deems relevant to its decision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19ยง
80.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
